tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We had  pregnancy consultation done with Poornima madam from initial days. Very friendly and gave us good guidance. Helped us have a normal delivery. She has taken good care and followups on both mother and child health during the course of 9 months. Very satisfied and thanks a lot Madam. Will surely recommend.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Mine was a twin pregnancy. Got my babies delivered through C-section. I have been consulting with Dr.Poornima Murthy, since Day-1 and it has been a wonderful journey so far. She is one of the coolest doctors whom I have ever met; she is simply superb and excellent in responding to all our queries, giving crystal clear opinions in all scenarios; She gives simple and perfect solution and never complicates any scenario. She is an epitome of positivity, confidence, calmness and clarity. On the day of delivery, it was a super-perfect feeling I had. There had not been even a pinch of fear in me regarding my cesarean. Poornima Mam handled it seamlessly and got my twin babies outside smoothly!!!  Heartful tones of Thank you to you Poornima Maam!!!!

Dr.Poornima Murthy is a very genuine Doctor with a lot of experience. I had my second baby at CloudNine Jayanagar, Normal delivery. She is calm and patient. ******* ********* ******** ************** Tells things frankly and leaves no stone unturned if at all there are any issues. I felt she is quite chilled out and will definitely try for Normal delivery if there are no major risk factors. Would definitely recommend her especially if you want Normal delivery and a smooth pregnancy. Even in the delivery room, I found her calm and cool. She is full of positivity,down to earth, soft spoken and cheerful. Many many thanks to you Dr. Poornima Murthy. 
Pranam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I had three visits with Dr. Poornima Murthy, and each time was extremely disappointing. 
During the first visit, she seemed more interested in her phone than addressing my concerns, barely speaking to us for more than three minutes. On the second visit, she was in a rush to leave, again on her phone, and spent a mere five minutes with us.
 The final straw was when I had an emergency, and she was nowhere to be found. Instead of providing immediate assistance, she insisted on making an appointment, even though it was clearly urgent.
 Overall, Dr. Murthy's lack of attention, disinterest, and unavailability during crucial times made the entire experience highly unsatisfactory.
I would advice all the people to think twice before visiting her .

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review: Very straightforward no-nonsense type doctor with a lot of experience.  She tries to give natural remedies and limits medications to only those necessary. I consulted with her in cloud nine and wait times were always less than five mins.  C-section surgery went very smoothly with her. I would definitely recommend Dr Poornima to others.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Amazing personality. There is no day where I don't remember her. She is not less than god to me. She is excellent at work. I had my first baby in cloudnine Jayanagar normal delivery. Case was completely handled by Dr. Poornima Murthy. She was right in every decision regarding my health and baby as well. My baby had health issues after birth and she was there for me at every point with her positive support. Thank you so much Doctor. You are the bestest

It's my first delivery and covid time I was not having any idea, checked in google. nd saw good reviews of Dr poornima most of the reviews are for normal delivery. Visited to the doctor and felt good, at the time of delivery got lot of pain and suffered whole night, morning one doctor came as poornima was not there she came in the morning ...tht doctor broke my water bag she spoke to poornima I guess and shifted to delivery room.. Poornima came i was in very heavy pain *** ****** ** ******** ** *** ***** **** ***** *** *** * ***** **** ********* ******** She suggested for operation at that moment we don't know what to do we trusted her and did c-section.

I know many women have c section it's common now *** **** *** ******** **** **** **** * ******* *** ****** ***** *** **** *** ********About hospital they just charge you more more and more.
She is a very sensible and sensitive doctor. Understands the patient and her insecurities and perfectly addresses them
Met Dr Poornima to check on my missed menstrual cycle. Doctor was extremely good and patient. Explained all my concerns and discussed my treatment plan. Highly recommend Dr Poornima.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: I visited this lady for PCOD related issue. *** *** **** ** ***** *** was not read to listen the case completely. She was judgmental about my personal life ****** ***** **** ** **** ******* ******** Moreover she was forceful about doing the test right at the hospital not externally.

I was very clear on what I was asking and none of the questions were directly answered by the doctor. It was all “we’ll see” kind of answers. No direct reply or explanation was given to any of my questions. Additional charges of ₹300 for registration were not mentioned while booking the appointment on Practo. The hospital lab was under maintenance and the reports were to be delayed. The hospital knew this but did not mention anything till they collected the payment.
Very thankful to d doc I hd my first delivery in cloudnine hosp had very great experience over there doc was very kindly n friends **** **** ***
